skmultiflow.core.instances.instance_header module¶

class skmultiflow.core.instances.instance_header.InstanceHeader(header=None)[source]¶

Bases: skmultiflow.core.base_object.BaseObject

Stores the header from an instance, simply keeps feature and label’s names

Parameters:header (list, optional) – The entries of the header.
